name: Catch the Mole Free
description:
Increase your reflexes by catching the red Moles with your finger!
Beware, it goes faster and faster!
You must keep rythm ever increasing.
The best score and the last score are recorded.

The grey Moles are your friends! Don't hit them!

Share your score online and try to stay in the world ranking.
If you agree, your location is automatically detected to display the flag of your country in the international scores table.

••• Game Features •••

• Very fun Graphics and Animations
• Develop your reflexes
• The difficulty ever increases
